name: part_002
file: tmp_【#大空スバル４周年】新衣装お披露目！！！！！４周年ありがとうございました！！！！！！！！：NEW 3D COSTUME !!! 4th anniversary Live【ホロライブ】 [n6yep2gl1HY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Oozora Subaru performs 'Sorairo Days' on stage.
Performance transitions to a beach scene with Subaru in a swimsuit.

subtitles.original: すべてがまるで当たり前みたいだった
subtitles.english: Everything seemed so natural

subtitles.original: 当たり前みたいだった
subtitles.english: It seemed so natural

subtitles.original: 遠い日々はまだ終わらない
subtitles.english: The distant days aren't over yet

subtitles.original: そしてまた
subtitles.english: And again

subtitles.original: 走り出した想いが今でも
subtitles.english: The feelings that started running even now

subtitles.original: この胸を確かに叩いてるから
subtitles.english: Are surely beating in this heart

subtitles.original: 今日の僕がその先に続く
subtitles.english: The me of today continues beyond that

subtitles.original: 僕らなりの明日を築いていく
subtitles.english: Building our own tomorrow

subtitles.original: 答えはそういつもここにある
subtitles.english: The answer, yes, is always here

subtitles.original: サマーハイヒール
subtitles.english: Summer High Heel

subtitles.original: グラスの氷 カラカラ かき回して ほら
subtitles.english: Stirring the ice in the glass, clatter clatter, look

subtitles.original: なんかいい感じでしょう
subtitles.english: It's a nice feeling, isn't it?

subtitles.original: ねえ ちょっと足も組んでみて そっと遠くを見つめ
subtitles.english: Hey, try crossing your legs a bit, gazing quietly into the distance

subtitles.original: なんかそれっぽい feeling
subtitles.english: A feeling like that

subtitles.original: 大人ぶった summer time だけど 私には全然物足りない
subtitles.english: An adult-like summer time, but for me, it's not enough at all

subtitles.original: 裸足になって海へ行きたい すぐに
subtitles.english: I want to go to the sea barefoot, right now

subtitles.original: 水着に着替え go dive! 水しぶき じゃ足りない
subtitles.english: Change into a swimsuit and go dive! A splash isn't enough

subtitles.original: 濡れた髪 結んで 大胆な lady
subtitles.english: Tying up wet hair, a bold lady

subtitles.original: ギラギラ 焼け Sunshine
subtitles.english: Glaringly burning Sunshine

subtitles.original: 小麦肌 憧れて 私らしく 夏を
subtitles.english: Longing for tanned skin, in my own way, the summer

subtitles.original: メイクしちゃうからね!
subtitles.english: I'll make it happen!

subtitles.original: 熱くなりすぎた身体 クリームソーダで
subtitles.english: My body's gotten too hot, with a cream soda

subtitles.original: cool down
subtitles.english: cool down

subtitles.original: こだわりフレーム サングラスかけ パラソルの下で
subtitles.english: Wearing stylish frames and sunglasses, under the parasol

subtitles.original: 優雅なスタイル 決まってる
subtitles.english: Looking elegant

subtitles.original: 砂浜を舞うビーチボール 不意に頭を過る君の姿
subtitles.english: A beach ball dancing on the sand, suddenly your image crosses my mind

subtitles.original: 来年こそは二人きりで
subtitles.english: Next year, for sure, just the two of us

subtitles.original: 過ごせたら
subtitles.english: If we could spend it...

subtitles.original: 火照り出す身体
subtitles.english: The body starting to flush

subtitles.original: 潮風浴びて
subtitles.english: Basking in the sea breeze

subtitles.original: イヤフォン越しのサマーチューン
subtitles.english: A summer tune through earphones

subtitles.original: 上がる体温
subtitles.english: Rising body temperature

subtitles.original: 今気分は最高!
subtitles.english: The mood right now is the best!

subtitles.original: だからもうダメ!
subtitles.english: So I can't take it anymore!

subtitles.original: 水着に着替え go dive! 全身で海感じたい
subtitles.english: Change into a swimsuit and go dive! I want to feel the sea with my whole body

subtitles.original: 脇目も振らないで はじけちゃって
subtitles.english: Without looking aside, just let loose

subtitles.original: キラキラ 眩い sunrise これぞ夏の真髄
subtitles.english: Sparkling, dazzling sunrise, this is the essence of summer

subtitles.original: 大人に憧れた日々 もう少し子供のままで
subtitles.english: The days I longed to be an adult, stay a child a little longer

subtitles.original: 私らしく夏を
subtitles.english: In my own way, the summer

subtitles.original: メイクしちゃおう!
subtitles.english: Let's make it happen!
